knimeNode.name: Histogram
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays data in a histogram view.

intro.p: Displays an histogram view with different viewing options.

The user can change the following properties on the fly:
Aggregation method (count, summary, average)
Number of bins for numerical attributes (incl. empty bars)
The width of the bars
Shows empty intervals option
Shows missing value bar option
Zooming
Crosshair cursor
...
To allow the work with huge datasets the user has to specify the desired x and aggregation column before opening the view. For more interaction use the "Interactive Histogram".

ports.dataIn: The data table that should be displayed.
